opinion.opinion_text:
GRANT AND DENIAL OF CASES IN WHICH TRANSFER TO THE INDIANA SUPREME COURT HAS BEEN SOUGHT A cumulative summary of cases in which transfer to the Indiana Supreme Court has either been granted or denied. This table includes cases disposed of from July 1, 2000 to December 31, 2000. An asterisk designates that the opinion of the Court of Appeals was an unpublished memorandum decision.
Citation Below Title or Cause Number Date Disposition
Seal v. Seal *726 N.E.2d 908 07/05/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Rutkowski v. Rutkowski *723 N.E.2d 485 07/05/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur except Shepard, C.J., who votes to grant transfer.
Snyder v. State *727 N.E.2d 1127 08/08/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Lee v. State *727 N.E.2d 1126 08/08/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Allen v. State *727 N.E.2d 1124 08/08/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Taylor v. State *22A01 9907 PC 231 08/08/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Cheesman v. Tippecanoe County Div. Office of Family and Children *732 N.E.2d 252 08/09/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Metcalf v. Estate of Hastings 726 N.E.2d 372 08/09/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Hudgens v. Wells County Div. of Family and Children 728 N.E.2d 204 08/09/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Arthur v. Monroe County Div. of Family and Children *727 N.E.2d 1124 08/09/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Hansboro v. State *727 N.E.2d 1125 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur except Dickson, J., who votes to grant transfer.
Wicks v. State *727 N.E.2d 1126 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Wilson v. State *727 N.E.2d 1122 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Motton v. State *727 N.E.2d 40 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Connor v. State *727 N.E.2d 1124 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Clark v. State 727 N.E.2d 18 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Dixon v. State *727 N.E.2d 1124 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Wilson v. State *727 N.E.2d 1125 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Goins v. State *727 N.E.2d 1126 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Sparks v. State *727 N.E.2d 1128 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur.
Balls v. State 725 N.E.2d 450 08/11/2000 Transfer denied. All Justices concur. Page 1248
